name: Flying Lufthansa's ICONIC 747-400: Palma to Frankfurt in 2023!
description:
Get Surfshark VPN at https://surfshark.deals/winginit - Enter promo code WINGINIT to get 83% off + THREE EXTRA MONTHS for free!

Enjoy the beauty of the 747-400 Jumbo Jet as I fly it on a rare opportunity from Palma Mallorca to Frankfurt in Germany. I'm on the top deck of the Jumbo and I hope you enjoy me sharing this unusual privilege with you!
